name: Loomies Galoomies
description:
A fun little action game. Glide around a neon map a zap as many green circles as possible. Yeah, I have run out of time to write more.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam.  I had a bit of a busy weekend so I didn't have the whole three days. That being said I am still pleased with how I did.

Let me know what your highest score was.

Controls:

-Move: WASD

-Pause: ESC or P
